definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Valentine's Day gifts available for sale at Praline.
sentences.chinese: 特製情人節精美禮物，精點坊有售。

sentences.english: Let life be beautiful like summer of flowers and death like autumn leaves.
sentences.chinese: 使生如夏花之絢爛，死如秋葉之精美。

sentences.english: The church's east window has beautifully coloured glass.
sentences.chinese: 教堂朝東的窗子是用精美的彩色玻璃鑲嵌成的。

sentences.english: Of all the pagodas I've seen, this one has the most beautiful relief carvings.
sentences.chinese: 在我大牛看過的塔裏面就屬它的磚雕最精美。

sentences.english: After eating the fine snack, Empress Dowager Cixi was fairly satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 慈禧太后吃了這精美的點心之後，很滿意。

sentences.english: I am fond of the book with lots of beautiful illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡那本里面有許多精美插圖的書。

sentences.english: Beautiful and delicacy glass-yarn lace, welcome to inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 精美玻璃紗花邊，歡迎訂購。

sentences.english: It was prettily engraved with flowers on the back.
sentences.chinese: 此件雕刻精美，背面有花飾圖案。

sentences.english: Chinese stitchery, you know, is beautifully patterned and exquisitely embroidered.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，中國刺繡品圖案精美，繡工精巧。

sentences.english: Her dress had got a fine lace train.
sentences.chinese: 她的禮服上有精美的紗拖裙。

sentences.english: However, many mooncake buyers expressed their dismay at the overly-elaborated boxes.
sentences.chinese: 然而許多月餅買家對過分精美的盒子表示了不滿。

sentences.english: Those that tell lies and have bad hearts are not able to see this fine cloth.
sentences.chinese: 那些說謊的和有壞的心的人是不能看見這精美的布的。

sentences.english: Many exquisite funerary objects were extracted from this grave.
sentences.chinese: 這個古墓裏出土了很多精美的隨葬品。

sentences.english: The abandoned tea boxes can be transformed into very fine jewelry boxes.
sentences.chinese: 廢棄的茶葉盒可以變身精美的首飾盒。

sentences.english: There you can rent such a carved house for quite an adequate price.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，你可以很經濟地租用到雕飾精美的屋子。

sentences.english: Suzhou Embroidery is famous for its extremely delicate stitches.
sentences.chinese: 蘇繡以其精美的繡品而聞名。

definition: original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
vivid and lifelike (idiom); true to life/realistic
lit. fine sculpting (idiom); fig. to work with extreme care and precision
